articles.description: Lata Mangeshkar, whose voice defined generations across South Asia, died in hospital in Mumbai at the age of 92.
articles.content:
Lata Mangeshkar, one of Indias biggest cultural icons and a singer who defined music and melody for generations across South Asia, has died at the age of 92, her doctor said.
